name: 2018 4th International Conference on Advances in Environment Research Hong Kong
content: Conference official website:http://www.icaer.org/ Paper Submission: 15-Feb.-2018 Acceptance Notice: 5-MAR.-2018 Registration Due: 25-Mar.-2018 Cconference overview: The Fourth International Conference on Environmental Studies in 2018 aims to promote communication and cooperation in the field of environment, providing professional academic exchange platform for professionals and scholars in related fields. Meeting time：May 28-30, 2018 Meeting place：Regal Oriental Hotel Published by： All the accepted papers will be published into Journal of Environmental Science and Development (IJESD, ISSN:2010-0264), and be included in the Engineering & Technology Digital Library, and indexed by CAS, WorldCat, Google Scholar, Cross ref, ProQuest , CABI. Call for papers: Environmental Science and Technology Meteorology Geophysics Physical oceanography Global environmental change and ecosystems management Submission instructions： 1.The conference only accepts English academic papers, and it is necessary to write the papers in English. 2.Papers published in periodicals must be full text,Article format(DOC) 3.Each piece of paper is usually limited to 8 pages, and additional pages will be charged. Conference Contact: Teacher Lydia Liu mailbox: icaer@cbees.net Tel:+ 852-3500-0137（Hong Kong）
